translations.translation: you will entice no one to them
Can mislead anyone away from Him,
shall not be able to tempt anyone away from Allah
You cannot make anyone rebel against Him.
Not against Him can you cause (any) to fall into trial,
you shall not tempt any against Him
can lure away from God any
Can tempt anyone to rebel against Him.
Can lead (any) into temptation concerning Allah,
Cannot lead astray [turn away from Him (Allah) anyone of the believers],
you shall tempt none against Him
You cannot tempt [anyone] away from Him
[37:162] — you cannot tempt, anyone, thereto, that is, to [incline to] your [worshipped] idols (‘alayhi, ‘thereto’, is semantically connected to His saying [bi-fātinīna], ‘you cannot tempt’),
(Ye cannot excite (anyone) against Him) you cannot lead anyone astray from His worship

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text: { مَآ أَنتُمْ } وآلهتكم { عَلَيْهِ } أي: على الله { بِفَاتِنِينَ } [الصافات: 162] أي: مفسدين معرضين، صارفين عموم الناس عن عبادته وإطاعته سبحانه بإغوائكم وإغرائكم ضعفة الأنام، وتغريركم إيَّاهم بعبادة الأصنام
